description:
Flashbacks reveal the agonizing sacrifice made by Ace`s mother in order save his life - and the secret behind his connection to Luffy. Back in the present, Whitebeard makes a unexpected entrance!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Vast Fleet Appears! Here Come the Whitebeard Pirates!
Kyodai Kantai Arawaru: Shuurai! Shirohige Kaizokudan
Une flotte imposante apparaît ! L`assaut des pirates de Barbe Blanche
Появление огромного флота! Вторжение пиратов Белоуса!
ظهور أسطول ضخم! ها قد أتى قراصنة اللّحية البيضاء!
巨大艦隊あらわる - 襲来! 白ひげ海賊団
